    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The technology involved in building the human Genome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Technologie bezog mit ein, wenn sie das 
menschliche Genom aufbaute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La technologie a impliqué en établissant le 
génome humain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A tecnologia envolveu em construir o genome 
humano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tecnologia ha coinvolto nello sviluppo del 
genome umano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τεχνολογία που περιλαμβάνεται στην οικοδόμηση του 
ανθρώπινου γονιδιώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tecnología implicó en la construcción del 
Genoma humano</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demostrates the technology and process of building a DNA library and the human genome.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">human genome</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation die demostrates die Technologie und
der Prozeß des Aufbauens einer DNA Bibliothek und des menschlichen 
Genoms.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui demostrates la technologie et le
processus d'établir une bibliothèque d'ADN et le génome humain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demostrates a tecnologia e o 
processo de construir uma biblioteca do DNA e o genome humano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che demostrates la tecnologia ed il
processo di sviluppo una libreria del DNA e del genome umano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που demostrates η τεχνολογία και η 
διαδικασία μια βιβλιοθήκη DNA και το ανθρώπινο γονιδίωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demostrates la tecnología y el
proceso de construir una biblioteca de la DNA y el genoma humano.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">DNA</string>
          </keyword>
